name: Changesets
description: An Azure Pipeline Task to automate releases with Changesets
helpMarkDown: An Azure Pipeline Task to automate releases with Changesets
author: leumasic

inputs.name: gitHubConnection
inputs.label: GitHub connection (OAuth or PAT)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the name of the GitHub service connection to use to connect to the GitHub repository. The connection must be based on a GitHub user's OAuth or a GitHub personal access token. Learn more about service connections [here](https://aka.ms/AA3am5s).

inputs.name: publish
inputs.label: Publish Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The command to use to build and publish packages

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: The command to update version, edit CHANGELOG, read and delete changesets. Defaults to `changeset version` if not provided

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Cwd
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the cwd for the node process. Defaults to `process.cwd()`

inputs.name: commit
inputs.label: Commit Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: The commit message. Defaults to `Version Packages`

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: Pull Request Title
inputs.helpMarkDown: The pull request title. Defaults to `Version Packages`

inputs.name: setupGitUser
inputs.label: Setup Git User
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets up the git user for commits as `'github-actions[bot]'`. Defaults to `true`

inputs.name: createGithubReleases
inputs.label: Create Github Releases
inputs.helpMarkDown: A boolean value to indicate whether to create Github releases after `publish` or not

outputVariables.name: published
outputVariables.description: A boolean value to indicate whether a publishing is happened or not

outputVariables.name: publishedPackages
outputVariables.description: A JSON array to present the published packages. The format is `[{'name': '@xx/xx', 'version': '1.2.0'}, {'name': '@xx/xy', 'version': '0.8.9'}]`

outputVariables.name: hasChangesets
outputVariables.description: A boolean about whether there were changesets. Useful if you want to create your own publishing functionality.

outputVariables.name: pullRequestNumber
outputVariables.description: The pull request number that was created or updated
